flowchart TD;
  subgraph UserGroup;
    LayerA;
    LayerB;
  end;
  subgraph AdminGroup;
    LayerC;
    LayerD;
  end;
    LayerA@{shape: stadium} -->|2| LayerC@{shape: stadium};
